name: Pile Growth
description:
Hello! My name is Zombie and I like mess! Sometimes I just like to throw my mess from one pile to another and the aim is to have higher pile than previously. Can you help me with that? Just click with your mouse on the item I am throwing – it will stop moving and gravity will do the rest of the trick.

After I have thrown the last item from my pile, I will give items 10 seconds to fall. After that – you will see your pile score! Don't forget to brag about it with your friends. Arrrr!
